description:
Dartrix was Hau`s starter Pokemon and his pride and joy. Dartrix hates the look of bedhead and it tried to clean up Ash`s Rowlet. It also really loves a challenge and it had been training so that Hau could take on the island challenge.
Hau`s Decidueye the evolved form of Hau`s Dartrix. It evolved from Dartrix just in time for the Alola League.
name: Fukuthrow (Hau)
